item.title: Training and Troubleshooting Services
item.description: Need help troubleshooting a transaction or have a question? Submit a ticket in Solution Manager under the Training Support service category and a Training Officer will answer your ticket as soon as possible!

item.title: Announcement
item.description: üì£‚Äã The GAC Dashboard just got an upgrade! Main features include better alignment for workflows and approvals with the Section 34 requirement, the rejection function returning transactions to AP coders for corrections, removal of the Change CCM option, and much more. This update will be live December 15th. To learn more about the latest improvements, check out our CAF√â session presentation<https://086gc.sharepoint.com/sites/msteams_d516a7/Shared%20Documents/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2Fmsteams%5Fd516a7%2FShared%20Documents%2FGeneral%2FSAP%20Video%20Library%20%2D%20Vid%C3%A9oth%C3%A8que%20SAP%2FGovernment%20Acquisition%20Cards%5FCarte%20d%E2%80%99achat%20du%20gouvernement%2FFlexible%20Workflow%2FSAP%20Caf%C3%A9%20%2D%20GAC%20Optimization%2Epdf&parent=%2Fsites%2Fmsteams%5Fd516a7%2FShared%20Documents%2FGeneral%2FSAP%20Video%20Library%20%2D%20Vid%C3%A9oth%C3%A8que%20SAP%2FGovernment%20Acquisition%20Cards%5FCarte%20d%E2%80%99achat%20du%20gouvernement%2FFlexible%20Workflow> and recording<https://086gc.sharepoint.com/sites/msteams_d516a7/_layouts/15/stream.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2Fmsteams_d516a7%2FShared+Documents%2FGeneral%2FSAP+Video+Library+-+Vid%C3%A9oth%C3%A8que+SAP%2FGovernment+Acquisition+Cards_Carte+d%E2%80%99achat+du+gouvernement%2FFlexible+Workflow%2FSAP+CAF%C3%89+Session+-+GAC+Improvements-20251209_180024UTC-Meeting+Recording.mp4&nav=eyJyZWZlcnJhbEluZm8iOnsicmVmZXJyYWxBcHAiOiJTdHJlYW1XZWJBcHAiLCJyZWZlcnJhbFZpZXciOiJTaGFyZURpYWxvZy1MaW5rIiwicmVmZXJyYWxBcHBQbGF0Zm9ybSI6IldlYiIsInJlZmVycmFsTW9kZSI6InZpZXcifX0%3D&startedResponseCatch=true&referrer=StreamWebApp.Web&referrerScenario=AddressBarCopied.view.87b7fe6c-ac04-4364-ab6b-87d9bda58555>.
